main event: A USAF B-26 crew sighted a round, glowing object hovering above a wooded area near Lititz, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for approximately 20 minutes.
The object then rapidly climbed and disappeared from view.
The report was submitted by the Strategic Air Command (SAC) in Newark.
The sighting occurred on September 22, 1952, at around 8:30 PM local time.
The object was described as round and glowing, with no visible means of propulsion and no audible sound.
